title: Rio Ferdinand on heartwarming moment his sons walked wife Kate down the aisle

Rio Ferdinand has opened up about the beautiful moment he watched his sons walk new wife Kate down the aisle to give her away.

Since getting together almost three years ago, former TOWIE star Kate has become a huge part of Rio's children's lives.

Now that she's officially stepmum to Lorenz, 13, Tate, 11, and Tia, eight, footballer Rio has given another insight into their amazing relationship.

Earlier today, Kate took to Instagram to share a stunning picture of the boys walking her down the aisle in Turkey last month.

Rio, 30, stands at the alter waiting as Lorenz and Tate each link arms with Kate, 28, and walk her towards their dad.

(Image: COPYRIGHT UNKNOWN)

She wrote: "There were so many special moments at our wedding ..... but this is one I will never forget #proud #myboys"

Rio re-shared the beautiful picture, revealing just how much it meant to him.

He said: "Wedding day My 2 boys walking my wife to be down the isle.

"Warmed my heart this...."

"So beautiful," one fan commented.

️Another said: "The most special moment that people both here and passed would be very proud. Many many congratulations"

(Image: Instagram)

The happy couple exchanged vows in front of close family and friends at the five-star luxury D Maris Bay hotel, in Turkey on Friday.

In the first interview about the wedding, Rio admitted he got "so emotional" when he saw his daughter Tia, eight, walk down the aisle before seeing his stunning new bride.

He told OK! magazine : “I cried as soon as the day started. Seeing Tia walk up the aisle before Kate set me off. It was just so emotional.

"There was just no going back on the emotion, that’s why I had to keep my shades on!

(Image: Instagram)

"Seeing Tate and Lorenz walk Kate down the aisle was particularly poignant and we wouldn’t have wanted to do it any other way.

"They were so proud and they couldn’t wait to do that, they felt important."

Kate and Rio began dating after the tragic death of his wife, Rebecca Ellison, the mother of his three children.

Their love story goes back to when the lovebirds first started dating in late 2016.

They had been together for two flourishing years before he popped the question.
